CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Micron is a world leader in innovative memory solutions that transform how the world uses information. We have approximately 40000 team members in 17 countries who work with the worlds most trusted brands delivering memory and storage systems for a broad range of applications and sparking countless possibilities in technology.
